'''Otogi Wood Rice Cake Soup Stand''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi Wood Rice Cake Soup Stand is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest on top of ruins to the east of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] at [[Chirai Shrine]] on Tsurumi Island.

Item Otogi Wood Rice Cake Soup Stand Context.png|Context
</gallery>
